Audio.Locality: Santa Cecilia, Serrania de San Lucas
Audio.Author: Thomas Donegan
Audio.Comments: ID not certain, bird in a flock with at least 10 other Furnariidae. Recordist notes say I thought it was Philydor rufum (which it sounds a bit like) but there were lots of birds around and this looks more like a Scythebill recording in note shape.
